name: BertTokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the BERT language model, using WordPiece tokenization.

name: GPT2Tokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the GPT-2 language model, using a modified Byte-Pair Encoding (BPE) algorithm.

name: RobertaTokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the RoBERTa language model, a variant of the BERT tokenizer with additional preprocessing.

name: DistilBertTokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the DistilBERT language model, which is a smaller version of BERT and uses the same tokenizer.

name: XLNetTokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the XLNet language model, based on a modified TransformerXL tokenizer.

name: T5Tokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the T5 language model, based on the SentencePiece algorithm.

name: GPT-JTokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the GPT-J language model, a variant of GPT-2, from the EleutherAI implementation.

name: LayoutLMTokenizer
description: Specialized tokenizer for the LayoutLM model, designed for document understanding tasks, same as BertTokenizer.

name: MBartTokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the multilingual BART (MBart) language model.

name: mBERTTokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the multilingual BERT (mBERT) language model, which supports a wide range of languages.

name: mT5Tokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the multilingual T5 (mT5) language model, a multilingual version of T5.

name: KBLabMegatronTokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the KBLab Megatron Large language model.

name: KBLabBERTTokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the KBLab BERT language model.

name: NB-BERTTokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the NB-BERT language model.

name: MistralTokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the Mistral language model.

name: GemmaTokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the Gemma language model.

name: LlamaTokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the Llama language model.

name: LTG-norT5Tokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the LTG NorT5 language model.

name: LTG-norMistralTokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the LTG NorMistral language model.

name: NB-GPT-J-Tokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the NB GPT-J language model.
